name: Fish And Sticks
description:
Shennanigam Game Submission

On the way to St Louise, Luis encounters piranhas who munch off his oar! Poor guy has to fight them off to survive!

Controls:

A and D to walk on the raft.

Left click to attack the flying piranhas.

Press "Space" to shake off the piranhas munching on your boat.

Developed by:

Kabir Lal: https://twitter.com/kabirmakes...

Priyanshu Mukhopadhyay: https://www.instagram.com/gori...
